Bangladesh: Urban civilization emerges at Mahasthangarh, Bogra district, capital of the Pundravardhana area.
Colombia: Cave paintings near Inirida river, Vichada department
India: The Upanishads, a sacred text of Hinduism, are written.
Malta: A Punic temple, dedicated to the mother goddess Astarte, is built over the remains of the Tas-Silġ megalithic temples. (to 200 BC)
